label: diag04_001
prompt: Man, this weather has been really crazy

children.label: diag04_002
children.prompt: Yes, I've lived here for only a little bit and I can't figure it out.  Have you lived here long?

children.label: diag04_003
children.prompt: Yeah, I've lived in this area almost my entire life.

children.label: diag04_004
children.prompt: What kind of things do you like to do on the weekends?

children.label: diag04_005
children.prompt: Usually I try to get caught up with things around the house and then watch a movie with my kids or something like that.  If the weather is nice we try to do something outside.

children.label: diag04_007
children.prompt: Same here.  We also usually go to church Sunday morning.  Do you go to church at all?

children.label: diag04_012
children.prompt: I used to go as a kid, but now just once in a while.  Definitely on Christmas and Easter.

children.label: diag04_013
children.prompt: Yeah, we try to go to Mass every Sunday

children.label: diag04_014
children.prompt: No, I just don't see a need for church.  I don't really believe in that stuff

children.label: diag04_006
children.prompt: Pretty much the usual.  Work around the house on Saturday and then we watch football on Sunday.
